name: FreePastaMaker
description:
Prepare your own pasta dish with a variety of international ingredients to choose from. All kind of sauces, vegetables, cheeses, meats, fishes and other specialities want to become a perfect dinner on your plate. No matter what part of the world you live, you will find some delicacy of your taste. Serve the perfect dish on the plate of your choice, choose a matching drink and make it unique with some accessories. Add a personal message or a picture and send it to us in e-mail or share on facebook. Bon Appetit!
In the payed version available much more items!
